name: Create Google Sheets for new Memberful orders completed
description: Every time a new order is completed in your Memberful, Make will automatically create a row with order information. Here's the [sheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/12olKfX3H3W-mTgUuHto8HykkryTvfU1WQduYPISaQfQ/edit?usp=sharing) used in this scenario.
